title.narrative: Cross-cutting focus areas: Civic space, emerging technologies, women and youth

Key results to be achieved: 1. Integrating a focus on civic space; enhancing civil society's visibility, protection and legitimacy; and enabling human rights defenders to play their part without fear, intimidation or attack. 2. Increased prioritization of women’s rights. 3. Making human rights more relevant and useful to young people.

target.value: 1. Integrating a focus on civic space; enhancing civil society's visibility. protection and legitimacy; and enabling human rights defenders to play their part without fear. intimidation or attack. 2. Increased prioritization of women’s rights. 3. Making human rights more relevant and useful to young people.

title.narrative: Key results to be achieved: 1. Strengthening of OHCHR’s efficient and responsible use of resources with the support of effective technologies. 2. Encouragement of innovation and implementation of proven results. 3. Expanded investment and support for OHCHR, with donors expressing confidence in the value delivered by their investments.

target.value: 1. Strengthening of OHCHR’s efficient and responsible use of resources with the support of effective technologies. 2. Encouragement of innovation and implementation of proven results. 3. Expanded investment and support for OHCHR. with donors expressing confidence in the value delivered by their investments.

title.narrative: Priority 1: Strengthened implementation of the outcomes of the international human rights mechanisms
Key result to be achieved: International human rights mechanisms are increasingly effective in promoting and protecting human rights.

target.value: Indicators only defined by OHCHR at output level.

title.narrative: Priority 2: Mainstreaming human rights in development and in peace and security

Key results to be achieved: 1) Integration of human rights by states and the UN as they implement the SDGs and other development and poverty eradication efforts. 2) Business actors effectively implement the UNGPs. 3) reventing violations and strengthening protection of human rights in situations of conflict and insecurity.

target.value: Indicators only defined by OHCHR at output level.
